advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_m: Follow the guidance of the moon and uncover a precious material
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_s: Find a fragment of solar energy concealed in vegetation
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_e: Relieve a predator of its powerful hide
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_d: Rescue the remnants of a star from its captor
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_m: Observe the transformation of a common metal
advancement.celestial_awakening.spotted_: Catch the attention of an otherworldly entity
tooltip.celestial_awakening.life_frag: Surround food with 4 fragments to give the food a minor healing effect.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.lunar_scale: Can be combined with gear in a crafting table to restore a small amount of durability.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.lunula_rock: An upgrade component for certain gear.
Landing a fully charged attack will unleash either a strike (if the attack was a critical hit) or a wave (if not)
Strike and wave have individual cooldowns of %s seconds each.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.moonlight_re:
Kills restore hunger and saturation, and grant 1 Lunar Orb (up to 6).
Each Lunar Orb reduces the cooldown of strike and wave by 0.25 seconds.
At 6 orbs, summon 2 weaker crescents when performing a strike or wave.
Lose 1 Lunar Orb 10 seconds after not gaining one.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.fluorescent_: Upon nocking an arrow, reveal all nearby enemies that aren't invisible.
When the arrow hits a target, reveal and damage all entities near the target.
Upon hitting an entity, damages and slows all entities behind the target.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.everlight_ar: Upon killing an enemy, ignite nearby enemies and gain absorption.

Applies glowing to attackers.
Reduces incoming damage for each nearby glowing entity.
Every 5 seconds, recover HP scaling with your current HP.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.knightmare_s: Upon killing an enemy, gain %s base damage for every 10 HP the enemy had for 15 seconds.

Hitting an enemy applies Honor Duel to the user.
Decreases damage taken from other enemies.
Decreases damage dealt to other enemies.
Honor Duel is removed if the user or the target is killed.
An entity can only be linked with one Honor Duel at a time.
Chance to gain special items upon breaking surface blocks or fishing up items.
When attacked, creates a comet that follows the wearer. After a short delay, the comet will launch towards the nearest enemy. If no enemy present, the comet is consumed to heal the user slightly.
Receive a buff at night depending on the moon phase.
Refund a portion of materials used in villager trades.

(NOT IMPLEMENTED YET)
Increases chance of fishing up treasures.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.radiant_armo: Obtain special materials upon gathering crops or killing animals.

Speeds up the growth of nearby plants.
Speeds up the growth and breeding recovery period of animals.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.remnant_armo: Upon falling below 20% of your max HP, gain increased attack damage, attack speed, and damage reduction for 5 seconds. Cooldown of 2 minutes.
Landing a critical hit will deal 20% of the damage dealt to surrounding enemies. Cooldown of 7 seconds
Each instance of damage taken is delayed by 5 seconds.
When an instance of damage is dealt, the amount is reduced based on how far the wearer is from when they were hit.
Increases damage dealt based on distance from the target.
Hitting a target at full HP will deal an additional %s damage. Cooldown of %s seconds, reduces cooldown by %s seconds on kill.
Hitting an enemy below 50% max HP will grant a speed boost to the wearer. Cooldown of 15 seconds, resets on kill.
Getting hit will apply Weakness 3 to the attacker for 3 seconds. Cooldown of 8 seconds
